note.para: If you're on 64-bit, invoke PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/lib32/pkgconfig at the beginning of the following command to build for 32-bit.

sect3.para: Install 32-bit only Wine by running the following commands:

sect3.title: WoW64
sect3.para: Install WoW64 Wine by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build-win64 && cd build-win64
../configure --prefix=/usr --enable-win64
make
cd .. && mkdir build-win32 && cd build-win32 &&
PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/usr/lib32/pkgconfig \ ../configure --prefix=/usr \ --with-wine64=../build-win64
make

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: --with-wine64=../build-win64: This option allows Wine during the compilation stage to use files built in the wine64 stage to enable support for both 32-bit and 64-bit.
